T02TD1489E:178b-3: rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag bo'i bdag / bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes bya ba 'dis rdo rje h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid can de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1489E:178b-4: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1489E:178b-5: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02TD1489E:178b-6: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1489E:178b-7: byang chub mchog tu rgyal rnams bzhed //
T02TD1489E:178b-8: ces brjod cing a'a:yig las skyes pa'i dril bu de kho na nyid kyis gzung bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:178b-9: de ni de rnams kyis dkrol bar bya ste //
T02TD1489E:178b-10: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02TD1489E:178b-11: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / mchog gi srid pa byed par 'gyur //
T02TD1489E:178b-12: zhes brjod de dril bu'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1489E:178b-13: yid kyi lus ni rten byed pas //
T02TD1489E:178b-14: phyag rgya'i dam tshig tu ni bshad //
T02TD1489E:178b-15: lus ni thams cad rten byed pa //
T02TD1489E:178b-16: gang yin des na phyag rgyar grags //
T02TD1489E:178b-17: zhes pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pas phyag rgya chen mo la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes byin nas kha sbyor gyi rim pas phyag rgyal 'khyud pa'i tshul byed du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya ma'i dam tshig go //
T02TD1489E:178b-18: de ltar dam tshig gsum dang ldan pa'i slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can la rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis dbang bskur bar dmigs nas /
T02TD1489E:178b-19: dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni //
T02TD1489E:178b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod cing /
T02TD1489E:179a-0: aom a'a:sarba ta th'a ga t'a bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um sv'a h'a zhes brjod de rnam par @179a * //
T02TD1489E:179a-1: rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:179a-2: de nas mi bskyod pa cod pan du rnam par bsams nas de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan rnams dang lha mo rnams kyang ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bos bzhugs par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:179a-3: aom su pra tishtha ta badzre sv'a h'a ;
T02TD1489E:179a-4: zhes byin gyis brlabs la mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:179a-5: de skad du yang shes rab bcu drug lon pa la /
T02TD1489E:179a-6: lag pa dag gis yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1489E:179a-7: rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor ba //
T02TD1489E:179a-8: slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod //
T02TD1489E:179a-10: de'i rjes su mdor bsdus pas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang rnam par dag pa yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:179a-12: yid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
T02TD1489E:179a-13: khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba //
T02TD1489E:179a-14: ye shes sems dag brtsegs shing bsdus //
T02TD1489E:179a-15: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus nas //
T02TD1489E:179a-16: sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags //
T02TD1489E:179a-18: don dam par ni rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can gyi de bzhin nyid kho na dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang lha'i de kho na nyid do zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi dbang ngo /
T02TD1489E:179a-20: // / de nas slob dpon gyis snying po la sogs pa'i sngags lan gsum bzlas nas /
T02TD1489E:179a-21: bcom ldan 'di la sbyin lags kyis //
T02TD1489E:179a-22: 'di la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1489E:179a-23: zhes brjod cing slob ma la sbyin no //
T02TD1489E:179a-25: bcom ldan bdag gis gzung lags kyis //
T02TD1489E:179a-26: bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1489E:179a-27: zhes sngags bzung nas lan gsum bzla bar bya'o zhes ba ni sngags gtad pa'o /
T02TD1489E:179a-29: // / de nas gser gyi thur mas de'i snod na gnas pa'i mar dang sbrang rtsi'i mig sman slob ma'i mig mig la sram yig bsams nas aom badzra ne tr'a ba ha ra pa ta lam hr'i:zhes brjod cing mig sman byug pa'i tshul byas nas 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1489E:179a-30: thar ldan sman pa'i rgyal po yis //
T02TD1489E:179a-31: ji ltar 'jig rten rab rib bzhin //
T02TD1489E:179a-32: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02TD1489E:179a-33: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02TD1489E:179a-34: zhes bya ba ni mig sman no /
T02TD1489E:179b-0: // / de nas slob ma la a'a:yig bzlas pa'i me long bstan @179b la ;
T02TD1489E:179b-1: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1489E:179b-2: gsal zhing dag la rnyog pa med //
T02TD1489E:179b-3: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1489E:179b-4: rgyu dang las las yang dag byung //
T02TD1489E:179b-5: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02TD1489E:179b-6: der ni gsal dag rnyog pa med //
T02TD1489E:179b-7: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid ni ;
T02TD1489E:179b-8: / bu khyod kyi ni snying la zhugs //
T02TD1489E:179b-9: rang bzhin med cing gnas med par //
T02TD1489E:179b-10: chos rnams de ltar shes nas khyod //
T02TD1489E:179b-11: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02TD1489E:179b-12: gang phyir skyob rnams sras su skyes //
T02TD1489E:179b-13: zhes bya ba ni me long ngo /
T02TD1489E:179b-15: // / de nas ho:yig las byung ba'i gzhu ho:yig gis byin nas sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga ya sva zhes brjod de /
T02TD1489E:179b-16: slob ma rnams kyis kyang sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga y'a mi zhes brjod cing bgegs thams cad 'bigs par bsams nas phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phang bar bya ste /
T02TD1489E:179b-17: steng du gcig dang 'og tu gzhan no zhes bya ba ni mda' 'phang ba'o /
T02TD1489E:179b-19: // / de nas bhr'um yig las skyes pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo aom badzra he tu mam zhes brjod cing slob ma'i lag pa g-yas su a'a:yig las skyes pa'i dung aom badzra bha sha ram zhes brjod cing g-yon du dbyangs dang po las skyes pa'i glegs bam dbyangs dang po brjod pas dang /
T02TD1489E:179b-20: dbyangs tha ma las skyes pa'i dril bu /
T02TD1489E:179b-21: dbyangs tha ma brjod cing byin nas dril bu dkrol du gzhug ste //
T02TD1489E:179b-22: thams cad nam kha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02TD1489E:179b-23: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
T02TD1489E:179b-24: nam mkha' mnyam par sbyor ba las //
T02TD1489E:179b-25: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02TD1489E:179b-26: zhes de'i rjes su 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1489E:179b-27: der nas brtsams te sems bskyed bcas //
T02TD1489E:179b-28: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD1489E:179b-29: chos kyi dung ni bla med pa //
T02TD1489E:179b-30: thams cad du yang gang bar gyis //
T02TD1489E:179b-31: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02TD1489E:179b-32: dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis khyod //
T02TD1489E:179b-33: gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul mchog gang //
T02TD1489E:179b-34: 'jig rten la ni rtag tu shod //
T02TD1489E:179b-35: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas pa //
T02TD1489E:179b-36: byas pa shes par nye bar brjod //
T02TD1489E:179b-37: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun yang //
T02TD1489E:179b-38: khyod la rnam pa kun du bsrung //
T02TD1489E:180a-0: @180a * // de bzhin du thun mong gi rjes su gnang pa byin nas rim pas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs su dmigs te slob ma la brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1489E:180a-1: 'jig rten kun du thams cad du //
T02TD1489E:180a-2: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02TD1489E:180a-3: ji ltar 'dul bas sna tshogs pa'i //
T02TD1489E:180a-4: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor //
T02TD1489E:180a-5: shes rab thams cad rang bzhin bdag / yid bzhin nor ltar mtho ba yis //
T02TD1489E:180a-6: dogs dang bral zhing zad min par //
T02TD1489E:180a-7: sems can don ni phun tshogs byas //
T02TD1489E:180a-8: chos kyi sgra'i gnas su rdo rje dang /
T02TD1489E:180a-9: rin po che dang padma dang /
T02TD1489E:180a-10: las kyi sgra bcug nas rjes su gnang ba rnam pa lnga sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:180a-11: slob mas kyang bla ma'i zhabs kyi padma gnyis la phyag byas nas /
T02TD1489E:180a-12: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1489E:180a-13: de ltar bgyi'o zhes brjod do //
T02TD1489E:180a-14: zhes bya ba ni rjes su gnang ba'o /
T02TD1489E:180a-17: // / de nas slob ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su dmigs nas /
T02TD1489E:180a-18: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1489E:180a-19: rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas //
T02TD1489E:180a-20: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02TD1489E:180a-21: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1489E:180a-22: zhes bya ba 'dis h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje byin la slob mas kyang /
T02TD1489E:180a-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma tishtha ae sha tv'am dh'a ra y'a mi badzra satva hr'i:hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod cing rdo rje gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so /
T02TD1489E:180a-25: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam gyi tshul du chos gos kyi rna ba g-yon ba'i khu tshur gyis gzung ba byas shing g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyas /
T02TD1489E:180a-26: srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bton nas //
T02TD1489E:180a-27: srid pa shin tu dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1489E:180a-28: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1489E:180a-29: 'di ni nga yis lung bstan bya //
T02TD1489E:180a-30: kye'i che ge mo badzra ta th'a ga ta siddhya sa ma ya stvam bhur bhu ba sva:zhes bya ba 'dis slob ma me tog phog pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su bya'o //
T02TD1489E:180b-0: gang yang drangs shing 'phags pa'i phyag rgyas lung bstan pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor @180b dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor pa rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de phyag rgya dang gsang sngags 'di nyid rab tu bsgoms so zhes dang par bya'o zhes dang par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lung bstan pa'o /
T02TD1489E:180b-2: // / de nas slob ma'i snying gar sngags thams cad kyis mngon par bsngags nas lag pa g-yon la kam ka na bcings shing mgo bor gdugs bzung bas skor ba byed du bcug nas thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor gyi sgor gdugs phub nas /
T02TD1489E:180b-4: slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02TD1489E:180b-5: zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab nas slob ma'i snying la 'bab pa'i tshig 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1489E:180b-6: da ni khyed rnams dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02TD1489E:180b-7: slob dpon sngags dang rgyud 'dzin par ;
T02TD1489E:180b-8: / sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1489E:180b-9: lha rnams dag kyang dgongs par 'gyur //
T02TD1489E:180b-10: sems can kun la brtse don du //
T02TD1489E:180b-11: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1489E:180b-12: rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya //
T02TD1489E:180b-13: mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yi //
T02TD1489E:180b-14: dkyil 'khor mthong zhing zhugs pas na //
T02TD1489E:180b-15: sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur //
T02TD1489E:180b-16: deng ni khyed rnams bde bar gnas //
T02TD1489E:180b-17: bde chen theg pa 'di las ni //
T02TD1489E:180b-18: phyin chad 'chi ba khyod la med //
T02TD1489E:180b-19: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das //
T02TD1489E:180b-20: srid pa'i mtha' ni shin tu grub //
T02TD1489E:180b-21: deng khyod skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1489E:180b-22: gang la legs par rab tu gnas //
T02TD1489E:180b-23: dam tshig lha rnams dang mnyam par //
T02TD1489E:180b-24: 'gyur ba la ni the tshom med //
T02TD1489E:180b-25: sangs rgyas rdo rje can kun gyis //
T02TD1489E:180b-26: de ring tshe ldan dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1489E:180b-27: khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che'i //
T02TD1489E:180b-28: bdag po nyid du khyod nges so //
T02TD1489E:180b-29: de ring bdud rnams las rgyal nas //
T02TD1489E:180b-30: grong khyer mchog tu khyod zhugs te //
T02TD1489E:180b-31: de ring sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par //
T02TD1489E:180b-33: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / khams gsum na ni gzhan med de //
T02TD1489E:181a-2: khyod kyis nam yang mi bya'o //
T02TD1489E:181a-3: 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing //
T02TD1489E:181a-4: myur bas khyod ni ci las 'jigs //
T02TD1489E:181a-5: sha lnga bdud rtsi bza' bya ste //
T02TD1489E:181a-6: de phyir dam tshig gzhan yang bsrungs //
T02TD1489E:181a-7: srog chags gsad par mi bya zhing //
T02TD1489E:181a-8: bud med rin chen spang mi bya //
T02TD1489E:181a-9: slob dpon spang bar mi bya ste //
T02TD1489E:181a-10: dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka' //
T02TD1489E:181a-11: shes rab thabs kyi bsam pa yis //
T02TD1489E:181a-12: mi bya cung zad yod ma yin //
T02TD1489E:181a-13: ma 'jigs khyod la sdig pa med //
T02TD1489E:181a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ji bzhin //
T02TD1489E:181a-15: de ltar yid ni rab dang rdo rje nyid du gyis ;
T02TD1489E:181a-16: / rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde ster bsten par gyis //
T02TD1489E:181a-17: 'gro ba bde ba nyung las rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1489E:181a-18: mtshungs pa'i rtag pa nyid du khyed rnams phyin par 'gyur //
T02TD1489E:181a-19: gzhan yang chos nyid 'di dang cho ga ji lta ba bzhin dbang bskur ba gang yin pa la dge ba'i phyir sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bu sdug ba bzhin du rab tu dang ba'i thugs kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni dbugs dbyung ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1489E:181a-21: // / dbang bskur ba de rnams la bum pa byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir bum pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02TD1489E:181a-22: de nas yol ba dang snam bu la sogs pa rnams kyis 'gol bar byas pa'i gnas su slob ma rang gi sems dga' ba'i shes rab ma bcu gnyis lon pa'am bcu drug lon pa yang rung /
T02TD1489E:181a-23: gzugs dad mtshan phun sum tshogs shing dam tshig dang sngom pa la gnas pa bla ma la phul nas pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
T02TD1489E:181a-24: lag pa sbyar nas bla ma la rdo rje sems dpar mngon sum du mos pa byas nas /
T02TD1489E:181a-25: khyod kyi zhabs kyi bka' drin gyis //
T02TD1489E:181a-26: bdag gis bla med bya ba thob //
T02TD1489E:181a-27: de phyir gsang ba'i dbang gis ni //
T02TD1489E:181a-28: mgon po rjes su gzung bar mdzod //
T02TD1489E:181a-30: / bla mas kyang skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi mthar dpal sdom pa'i sku dang shes rab phag mo'i gzugs su bskyed nas rdo rje dang padma 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas snyoms par 'jug par bya zhing aom sarba ta th'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a b'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1489E:181b-0: zhes bya ba'i sngags @181b brjod cing rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i phyogs bcur gnas shing snyoms par zhugs pa'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro rnams yid kyis bcug nas /
T02TD1489E:181b-1: 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur pa aa wa dh'u t'i nas 'ong bas dga' ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis rdo rje nor bur lhan cig skyes pa rang nyid kyis rig par byas nas mthe bong dang srin lag gis nor bu btsir nas rdo rje nam mkha'i khams su rnam par bsam pa'i shes rab kyi padma las byung nas slob ma gsung rdo rje'i gzugs can gyi khar /
T02TD1489E:181b-3: ji ltar sangs rgyas sras dbang bskur //
T02TD1489E:181b-4: byang chub sems kyi bza' ba yis //
T02TD1489E:181b-5: de bzhin bu khyod dbang bskur ro //
T02TD1489E:181b-6: zhes dang rtsa ba'i sngags kyang brjod la byang chub kyi sems dbab par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:181b-7: shes rab gdong yang bcing ba dang //
T02TD1489E:181b-8: thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin te //
T02TD1489E:181b-9: mthe bo ming med dag gis ni //
T02TD1489E:181b-10: slob ma'i khar ni dbab par bya //
T02TD1489E:181b-12: des kyang dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad zhu ba ni 'di yin no zhes mos par byas nas aa ho ma h'a su kham zhes brjod cing btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:181b-13: shes rab ma langs la gos med pa nyid du padma na gnas pa'i bdud rtsi'i thig le rnams de'i khar gzhug ste /
T02TD1489E:181b-14: des kyang de bzhin du btung bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:181b-15: shes rab dang thabs dag gis kun rdzob pa'i gsang ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyis dbang bskur ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o /
T02TD1489E:181b-17: // / de nas 'dod pa'i shes rab de nyid las tha dad pa gzhan yang rung si la ga phur dang gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa'i phyag rgya ma gtad par 'os pa ste /
T02TD1489E:181b-18: gang gis bdag ni khyod drin las //
T02TD1489E:181b-19: lhan skyes ye shes thob gyis [*kyis] te //
T02TD1489E:181b-20: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1489E:181b-21: dbang phyug mchog gis bdag la stsol //
T02TD1489E:181b-22: zhes gsol ba btab par gyur pa de las slob ma'i lag pa g-yon pa ste de gnyis rang gi lag pa g-yon pas bzung la /
T02TD1489E:182a-0: @182a * // g-yas pas slob ma'i spyi bo rdo rje bzung nas /
T02TD1489E:182a-1: 'dir ni khyod rnams dbang bo yin //
T02TD1489E:182a-3: zhes dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams dpang du byas nas /
T02TD1489E:182a-5: bsten byar sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags //
T02TD1489E:182a-6: 'khor lo rim pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1489E:182a-7: bde ba dam pa myang bar bgyi //
T02TD1489E:182a-8: thabs gzhan gyis ni sangs rgyas min //
T02TD1489E:182a-9: de bas 'di dang bral bar ni //
T02TD1489E:182a-10: khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig /'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1489E:182a-11: rig ma'i brtul zhugs bla na med //
T02TD1489E:182a-12: rmongs pa gang zhig 'da' byed pa //
T02TD1489E:182a-13: de la mchog gi dngos grub med //
T02TD1489E:182a-14: ces brjod la shes rab ma gtad par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:182a-15: des kyang dri bzang po dang me tog gi phreng bas lus nye bar mdzes par byas shing dgod cing dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi mdangs kyis //
T02TD1489E:182a-16: bu khyod spro ba nyid dam ci //
T02TD1489E:182a-17: bshad gci la sogs za ba dang //
T02TD1489E:182a-18: sha khrag khu ba de bzhin te //
T02TD1489E:182a-19: bud med la gus de bzhin gzhan //
T02TD1489E:182a-21: ji ltar bde ba bu yis smros //
T02TD1489E:182a-22: de ltar 'dod pa'i mtshan ma brjod //
T02TD1489E:182a-23: des kyang 'di skad du smra bar bya ste /
T02TD1489E:182a-24: lha mo bdag ni cis mi spro //
T02TD1489E:182a-25: khu khrag la sogs pa bza' ste //
T02TD1489E:182a-26: lus kyis rtag tu bud med gus //
T02TD1489E:182a-27: bha ga la yang 'o byed do //
T02TD1489E:182a-28: de nas de dga' zhing gus pas tsandan dang gur gum la sogs pa rnams kyis rang gi 'od bzhin du dris byugs nas gcer bur slob ma la chu skyes ston par byed do //
T02TD1489E:182a-30: bde ba kun dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1489E:182a-31: gang zhig cho gas ston byed pa //
T02TD1489E:182a-32: de yi mdun na bdag gnas so //
T02TD1489E:182a-33: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
T02TD1489E:182a-34: sems can khams ni rab dgrol byed //
T02TD1489E:182a-35: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02TD1489E:182a-36: dngos po kun la rnam par gnas //
T02TD1489E:182a-37: sangs rgyas mchod pa la sogs pa //
T02TD1489E:182a-38: padmar bya ba ji bzhin gyis //
T02TD1489E:182a-39: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02TD1489E:182a-40: 'di nyid na ni rtag tu bzhugs //
T02TD1489E:182a-41: bham dza moksha ho: zhes so //
T02TD1489E:182b-0: de nas rang @182b nyid 'khor lo sdom pa'i sku dang shes rab phag mo'i gzugs su bskyed nas hr'i: h'um dag las skyes pa'i padma dang rdo rje dag a'a: aom yig las skyes pa'i lte ba dang nor bur bsams nas rdo rje'i kha phat yig ser po dang shi yig bya ste /
T02TD1489E:182b-1: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i rtsa g-yon na gnas shing 'dug pa sor mos cung zad bskul bas shes nas de bla mas brjod pa lags so //
T02TD1489E:182b-2: aom sarba tath'a ga t'a nu r'a ga na badzra sva bh'a w'atma ko& ham zhes brjod cing /
T02TD1489E:182b-3: bla mas nye bar bstan pa'i dga' ba'i dbye ba rnams rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyis bkug pa'i dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus bla mas byin pa'i 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i yid kyi dga' ba brtsam par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:182b-4: rdo rje padmar rab bzhag nas //
T02TD1489E:182b-5: byang chub sems ni dbyung mi bya //
T02TD1489E:182b-6: bskyod par byas nas de dga' ba'i //
T02TD1489E:182b-7: sems kyis gang bar bsgom par bya //
T02TD1489E:182b-8: ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing //
T02TD1489E:182b-9: byang chub snying po mkha' 'dra ba //
T02TD1489E:182b-10: rdul bral thar ster zhi ba nyid //
T02TD1489E:182b-11: khyed kyi pha yang rang nyid do //
T02TD1489E:182b-12: rnal 'byor pa yis ji srid du //
T02TD1489E:182b-13: byang chub sems 'dor mi byed bya //
T02TD1489E:182b-14: de srid rgyun mi 'chad pa yi //
T02TD1489E:182b-16: byang chub sems ni ltung gyur na //
T02TD1489E:182b-17: dngos grub kun gyi gter yin pas //
T02TD1489E:182b-18: phung po rnam shes brgyal ba la //
T02TD1489E:182b-19: ma smad dngos grub ga la yod //
T02TD1489E:182b-20: mkha' dbyings rdo rje sbyor ba las ;
T02TD1489E:182b-21: / reg pa'i bde ba rmad byang che //
T02TD1489E:182b-22: gang de mchog tu dga' ba yi //
T02TD1489E:182b-23: byed pa po ste bskyed par bya //
T02TD1489E:182b-24: mchog dang dga' bral dag gi dbus //
T02TD1489E:182b-25: brtan por mtshon la brtan par bya //
T02TD1489E:182b-26: padma'i nam mkhar nor bu yi //
T02TD1489E:182b-27: lte ba bsdams pa'i gnas su'o ;
T02TD1489E:182b-28: / rdo rje skyil krung gis sems ni //
T02TD1489E:182b-29: nor bu'i nang du gnas par blta //
T02TD1489E:182b-30: gang gang ye shes skye 'gyur ba //
T02TD1489E:182b-31: ye shes rang bzhin de yis chog /'dod chags med cing chags bral med //
T02TD1489E:182b-32: dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te //
T02TD1489E:183a-2: bde ba brtan bya 'gyur ba'ang min //
T02TD1489E:183a-3: thun nam yang na nyin mo gcig / zla ba'am zla phyed lo dang ni //
T02TD1489E:183a-4: bskal pa'am bskal pa stong du yang //
T02TD1489E:183a-5: ye shos mngon par sbyor bas gnas //
T02TD1489E:183a-6: slob mas cha shas bzung nas ni //
T02TD1489E:183a-7: padma'i lte bar phyung ba na //
T02TD1489E:183a-8: de nas ro ma yis ni sems //
T02TD1489E:183a-9: byang chub sngon du 'gro bas gzung //
T02TD1489E:183a-10: shes rab las lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba ni shes rab ye shes so /
T02TD1489E:183a-12: // / de nas ji skad bshad pa'i cho gas shes rab ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba nyid la 'bras bur gyur pa bzhi pa'i dbang sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:183a-14: ji skad gsungs pa'i cho gas dbang bskur ba //
T02TD1489E:183a-15: sbyin nas slob ma'i mos pa yid kyis brtag / zab cing rgya che'i tshul la mos gyur na //
T02TD1489E:183a-16: dbang bskur rin chen tshig gis sbyin par bya //
T02TD1489E:183a-17: 'o na 'di rgya che ba la mos pa'am yang na ma yin no zhes bya ba ji ltar rtogs par bya zhe na /
T02TD1489E:183a-18: du ba las ni mer shes dang //
T02TD1489E:183a-19: chu skyar las ni chur shes pa //
T02TD1489E:183a-20: byang chub sems dpa' yi ni rigs //
T02TD1489E:183a-21: blo dang ldan pas mtshan mas shes ;
T02TD1489E:183a-22: / bzhin gyi chu skyes rab dang zhing //
T02TD1489E:183a-23: dga' bas lus kyi spu ldang ba //
T02TD1489E:183a-24: de nyid mthong nas mkhas pa yis //
T02TD1489E:183a-25: slob ma dam pa rjes gzung bya //
T02TD1489E:183a-26: shes rab ye shes de nyid myu gur gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pas rab tu 'phel bzhin pa /
T02TD1489E:183a-27: sgrib pa med pa nyid dang ldan pa'i da kho na nyid chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang bzhin yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin ni bzhi pa'i don yin no //
T02TD1489E:183a-29: der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med //
T02TD1489E:183a-30: srid min mya ngan 'das pa min //
T02TD1489E:183a-31: bdag med gzhan yang med pa ste //
T02TD1489E:183a-32: 'di de mchog tu bde chen po //
T02TD1489E:183a-34: rgyu dang bral zhing 'gro la rtag tu shar //
T02TD1489E:183a-35: gang zhig dus su nges par gsungs pa na //
T02TD1489E:183b-0: thams cad mkhyen @183b pa'ang tshig gis dbul 'gyur ba //
T02TD1489E:183b-1: bde ba'i rgyal po gcig bu rgyal gyur cig / bla mas bstan pa ma yin na //
T02TD1489E:183b-2: slob mas go ba ma yin te //
T02TD1489E:183b-3: lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro //
T02TD1489E:183b-4: su la su zhig gis ni brjod //
T02TD1489E:183b-5: blo yi spyod yul ma yin pas na tshig gi gdags pa med //
T02TD1489E:183b-6: rgya chen po la bla mas gzhag pa gtam gyi 'jug pa gzhi //
T02TD1489E:183b-7: de ni rim gyis snying rje la sogs yon tan la 'doms te //
T02TD1489E:183b-8: dad ldan rnams kyi snying gi gnas su rang nyid 'byung ba yin //
T02TD1489E:183b-9: 'o na byang chub kyi sems skyes pa'i mtshan nyid ci zhe na /
T02TD1489E:183b-10: gnyid log pa yi dbang po bzhin //
T02TD1489E:183b-11: yid ni snang med thim 'dra ba //
T02TD1489E:183b-12: g-yo med bzhin du'ang snang ba yin //
T02TD1489E:183b-13: lus ni dam pa'i bde bas rgyal //
T02TD1489E:183b-14: dbang po'i sde rnams 'jug pa med pa dang //
T02TD1489E:183b-15: srid pa'i sa bon rnam rtog mtha' dag nyams //
T02TD1489E:183b-16: kun du dga' ba 'di de mkha' mtshungs kyang //
T02TD1489E:183b-17: bsil ba thob pa'i myong ba aa la la //
T02TD1489E:183b-18: 'dir ni dbang po them par gyur //
T02TD1489E:183b-19: bdag kyang de bzhin song ba'i tshe //
T02TD1489E:183b-20: lhan skyes dga' ba sbyin byed pa //
T02TD1489E:183b-21: bla ma'i zhabs la gsal bar dris //
T02TD1489E:183b-23: gang zhig shar dus tshe na dbang po dang //
T02TD1489E:183b-24: yul rnams mnyam du nub gyur de la 'dud //
T02TD1489E:183b-25: mkhas dang 'gro ba'i snying la ci yang gnas //
T02TD1489E:183b-26: phyis ni mngon dga' rgyal ba'i mdzes sku gcig / de bas na /
T02TD1489E:183b-27: 'di na dam pa'i bde ba'i stobs las blo //
T02TD1489E:183b-28: gang gi rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag bcom //
T02TD1489E:183b-29: mkhas pa de ni bya ba byas pa ste //
T02TD1489E:183b-30: gzhan pa de rnams rkang gnyis phyugs yin no //
T02TD1489E:183b-31: gang du dngos dang dngos med bral zhing dben //
T02TD1489E:183b-32: rang gsal 'dzag pa'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin rgyas //
T02TD1489E:183b-33: 'di ni nam mkha'i mtha' yang khyab par byed //
T02TD1489E:183b-34: rnam pa thams cad dang bral dri ma med //
T02TD1489E:183b-35: dkyil 'khor phal cher de yis gsal ba mthong //
T02TD1489E:183b-36: bde ba thams cad kyi ni gzhir gyur te //
T02TD1489E:183b-37: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bzhi par brjod //
T02TD1489E:184a-0: de'i phyir the tshom med par sku gsum gyi rjes su 'jug pa @184a * //
T02TD1489E:184a-1: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i bde ba chen po kho na bzhi par shes par bya'o zhes bya'o //
T02TD1489E:184a-2: de ltar dbang bskur ba thob pa'i slob mas bya ba byas pa 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1489E:184a-3: deng bdag skye ba 'bras bur bcas //
T02TD1489E:184a-4: bdag gson pa yang 'bras bur bcas ;
T02TD1489E:184a-5: / de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02TD1489E:184a-6: sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur to //
T02TD1489E:184a-8: de nas bla ma la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yon dbul bar bya ste /
T02TD1489E:184a-9: sna tshogs pa'i rgyan dang gos la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1489E:184a-10: khyad par du yang rang gi lus so zhes bya ba ni mngon par dbang bskur pa'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1489E:184a-12: // / de nas slob dpon gyis rgyas pa dang zhi ba'i phyir cho ga bzhin sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02TD1489E:184a-13: de la me'i lha me la bskyed par gyur pa na slob ma'i mthe bong nas bzung nas kha dog lnga'i srad bus yang dag par bcings pas sam //
T02TD1489E:184a-14: rang nyid rgyas pa dang zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02TD1489E:184a-15: me la mar gyis bkang ba'i mthar thug pa byas nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor rgya chen po mchod cing gar dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i yo byad dang bcas pa'i dam tshig gi kun du spyod pas gtor ma'i cho ga rnams kyis 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag po tshim zhing yang dag par mchod nas sbyin sreg gi bya ba rdzogs par byas te /
T02TD1489E:184a-16: slob ma'i 'dod pas yon sbyin pa sngon du 'gro ba'i mchod pas dgyes pa dang /
T02TD1489E:184a-17: de nas 'thon nas phyi rol du gzhag pa'i phyogs kyi gtor ma'i mthar zhugs nas 'khor lo la phyag byas te /
T02TD1489E:184a-18: 'khor lo'i dbang po la mchod yon la sogs pa phul nas dge ba bsngos te /
T02TD1489E:184a-19: dkyil 'khor la lan gsum du bskor nas shar sgor 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pas he ru ka'i yi ge brgya pa lan gsum brjod cing /
T02TD1489E:184a-20: ma rnyed ces bya ba la sogs pas bzod par gsol nas /
T02TD1489E:184a-21: aom khyed kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02TD1489E:184b-0: aom a'a: h'um badzra mu: zhes bya @184b bas ye shes kyi 'khor lo gshegs su gsol nas dam tshag gi 'khor lo bdag nyid la nang du bcug ste /
T02TD1489E:184b-1: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:184b-2: aom a'a: h'um mu: zhes brjod cing chos thams cad skye ba med par mos pas dril bu dkrol zhing lag par gnas pa'i rdo rjes dang por sgo nas brtsams te tshangs pa'i thig gi lam gtso bo'i gnas ji srid par dbyi zhing rang gi spyi bor rdul tshon cung zad tsam bzhag nas padma la sogs pa dbyi bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:184b-3: de nas sgo rnams dang mtshams rnams kyang lag par gnas pa'i rdo rjes dbyi bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:184b-4: de nas rdo rje bcings pa'i mthe bong gnyis bcug ste sdigs mdzub gnyis bstan pa bzhin du 'khyil pa byas nas /
T02TD1489E:184b-5: aom badzra k'i la autk'i la ya sarba k'i l'a nam badzra dha r'adzny'a y'a h'um h'um h'um h'um phat ho: zhes 'don zhing h'um gi yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyis phur bu rnams bskyed nas /
T02TD1489E:184b-6: aom ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ne sarb'a rththa sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:184b-7: zhes brgyad dang bcas pa'i brgya bzlas nas 'o mas bkru bar bya zhing phur bu'i lha rnams kyang gshegs su gsol te khung bu yang dgang bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:184b-8: zhi ba la sogs pa don du gnyer ba yod na sbyin zhing rdul tshon lhag ma rnams ni rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par blugs nas glang po che la sogs pa'i bzhon pa'i steng du bkod nas gos la sogs pas brgyan zhing /
T02TD1489E:184b-9: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis gzung ba'i 'do li la gnas pa'i slob dpon nam slob mas dril bu dang bcas pa'i sgra bkra shis kyi glu dang sil snyan dang ga dugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang snod kyi rnam pa rnams kyis chu klung la sogs pa rnams kyi 'gram du bzhag nas gnas gtsang mar dkar po'i dris padma 'dab ma brgyad pa byas pa'i lte ba la rdul tshon gyi bum pa bzhag nas /
T02TD1489E:185a-0: de'i steng du dmigs pas rdo rje sems dpa' cho ga bzhin yang dag par mchod nas 'dab ma las phyi rol gyi char bye ma'i rang bzhin gyi klu brgyad rnams 'du byas nas de rnams kyi don @185a * //
T02TD1489E:185a-1: gyi phyir 'o ma'i gtor ma brgyad kham por gtsang mar 'bras kyis gang ba stegs bu la gtor ma dang me tog dkar pos mchod cing ba dan dkar po dang /
T02TD1489E:185a-2: lha bshos chen po la sogs pa rnams 'dab ma rnams la gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185a-3: de nas slob dpon gyis rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i gtso bor dbus su'o //
T02TD1489E:185a-4: shar gyi 'dab ma la mtha' yas /
T02TD1489E:185a-7: byang du b'a su ki / dbang ldan du padma chen po /
T02TD1489E:185a-11: phyi rol du klu thams cad kyis gang bar bsams nas de nas me tog dkar pos mchod cing /
T02TD1489E:185a-12: aom a'a: badzra satv'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-13: aom a'a: aa nant'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-14: aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-15: aom a'a: taksha k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-16: aom a'a: b'a su k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-17: aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-18: aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-19: aom a'a: karkko ta k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-20: aom a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD1489E:185a-21: zhes bya ba rnams kyis mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog la sogs pas mchod nas lag pa g-yon pas gdengs ka'i tshul gyis gzung ba'i me tog lag pa g-yas pa brkyang nas /
T02TD1489E:185a-22: aom aa nanta b'a su ki ta ksha ka karkko ta ka padma ma h'a padma sham kha b'a la ku li ka b'a la de ba ti ma h'a de ba ti so m'a shi khi ma h'a shi khinda dha ra ma h'a danda dha ra aa sa l'a la hu lunda na ndo pa nan da s'a ga ra ma h'a s'a ga ra ma tapta shr'i k'a nti ma h'a k'anti ratna k'anti su ru sa bha rb'a hi ka ma ho da ra shi li shi li ma h'a shi li /
T02TD1489E:185a-23: aom bha nydza bha nydza aa gatstsha a'a gatstsha ma h'a n'a g'a dhi pa ti sarbba bhu rbhu ba sva:/
T02TD1489E:185a-24: zhes brjod cing klu rnams la 'o ma'i gtor ma byin nas mchod de sgeg pa'i dril bus mchod cing yi ge brgya pa brjod nas bzod par gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185a-25: de'i tshe slob mas chu phra mo'i rgyun 'bab pa'i klung rnams su rnyog pa med pas bzung nas rdul tshon gyi bum pa rnams rab tu g-yo ba dang bcas pas bzung nas klu rnams la gtang par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185a-26: aom mi li mi li h'um dza: sv'a h'a zhes brjod cing gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185b-0: klu'i dbang po rnams kyis sa 'og gi mthil du spyan drangs par bsam @185b par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185b-1: de nas slob dpon gyis chu klung du klu'i ba ngan dkar po btsugs nas d'ur wa dang /
T02TD1489E:185b-2: me tog kunda dang ldan pa'i 'o ma'i rgyun dbab par bya ste gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185b-3: slob mas ni kunda de nyid rang gi lag par bzung nas de nyid kyis bkrus pa'i bum pas so sor blangs nas bum pa de chus gang par byas shing bkra shis kyi glus bla ma'i spyan sngar 'gro ba byas nas /
T02TD1489E:185b-4: yang dkyil 'khor gyi khang par zhugs nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa la'o mas byas pa'i mandala la bum pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185b-5: bla mas ni zhi ba'i don du des dkyil 'khor gyi sa la gtor nas rang nyid kyis kyang bzung ste gzhan la yang byin nas khyim la sogs pa bsten par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185b-6: des pa byung gis byugs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang par gzhon nu ma rnams 'o thug la sogs rnams kyis tshim par bya zhing mchod par bya'o zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor nye bar bsdu ba'o /
T02TD1489E:185b-8: // / de nas 'khor lo byas nas gtor ma dbul ba byas te /
T02TD1489E:185b-9: skye bo dam pa tshogs pa'i ston mo bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185b-10: de nas byas pa rnams kyis mgon po rnams la yang gtad par bya'o //
T02TD1489E:185b-11: 'gro la phan pa'i bya ba bkod de chos la thugs gcig pa //
T02TD1489E:185b-12: ches mkhas blo yi dbang po chos kyi blo gros mi yi dbang //
T02TD1489E:185b-13: de yis bdag la gsol ba btab las dkyil 'khor cho ga rnams //
T02TD1489E:185b-14: cher gsal 'di byas pa ni skye bo gzhan la phan phyir ro ;
T02TD1489E:185b-15: / zhes pa bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dpal ba na ratna'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1489E:185b-17: // /'di ni phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i blo gros can bsod nams rgya mtsho'i sdes ku sumbha'i ke sa ra'i me tog dang bcas te bskul ba las //
T02TD1489E:185b-18: rje grub pa'i dbang phyug de nyid kyi 'bangs su gyur pa gzhon nu dpal zhes bya bas ljang pu bkra shis dgon pa'i dben gnas su bsgyur pa'o /
